Generation IX.Scarlet: This Pokémon can store energy in its large dewlap. Mabosstiff unleashes this energy all at once to blow away enemies.
Generation IX.Violet: Mabosstiff loves playing with children. Though usually gentle, it takes on an intimidating look when protecting its family.

Generation IX.Scarlet: West Province: Area Three North Province: Area Two , Casseroya Lake , Socarrat Trail Tera Raid Battles ( 5★ , 6★ )
Generation IX.Violet: West Province: Area Three North Province: Area Two , Casseroya Lake , Socarrat Trail Tera Raid Battles ( 5★ , 6★ )
